actions.committee: House Committee on Energy and Commerce
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Energy and Commerce.

official_title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide additional authorizations of appropriations for the health centers program under section 330 of such Act.
subjects: Department of Health and Human Services

summary.text: Health Centers Renewal Act of 2006 - Amends the Public Health Service Act to authorize appropriations for FY2007-FY2011 for health centers to meet the health care needs of medically underserved populations.

titles.title: To amend the Public Health Service Act to provide additional authorizations of appropriations for the health centers program under section 330 of such Act.
